getStation

public Station getStation(int stationId)
                   throws java.sql.SQLException
Retrieves the Station with this stationId, or null if none is found. Permits the retrieval of a station with no POR.

Parameters:
stationId - The stationId of a station in the database
Returns:
Station with this stationId
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException - If an error occurs

stationFromIdentifier

public Station stationFromIdentifier(java.lang.String id)
                              throws java.sql.SQLException
Retrieves a station from a station_id or wbanno. Permits the retrieval of a station with no POR.

Parameters:
id - The identifier of the station
Returns:
a Station fitting the identifier
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException - If an error occurs

stationFromAtddno

public Station stationFromAtddno(java.lang.String atddno)
                          throws java.sql.SQLException
Retrieves a station from atddno. Permits the retrieval of a station with no POR. NOTE: Can't uniquely add atddno to stationFromIdentifier method, because there is overlap between stationId and atddno.

Parameters:
atddno - The atddno of the station
Returns:
a Station with this atddno
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException - If an error occurs

                                                throws java.sql.SQLException
Retrieves a List with PORs from an identifier list: station_id, wbanno, goesid

Parameters:
ids - The identifiers of the Stations
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException - If an error occurs

stationFromName

public Station stationFromName(java.lang.String state,
                               java.lang.String location,
                               java.lang.String vector)
                        throws java.sql.SQLException
Retrieves a station from its unique state-location-vector (eg "AL", "Gadsden", "19 N"). Permits the retrieval of a station with no POR.

Parameters:
state - eg "AL"
location - eg "Gadsden"
vector - eg "19 N"
Returns:
the Station at state+location+vector
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException - If an error occurs

getLastModForStation

public java.lang.String getLastModForStation(int stationId,
                                             int begin,
                                             int end)
                                      throws java.sql.SQLException
Retrieves the last time an observation was modified for a station between two datetimes.

Parameters:
stationId - The id of the station
begin - The earliest datetime to consider
end - The last datetime to consider
Returns:
The last modification time as a YYYYMMDDHH24MI String
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException - If an error occurs
